DOC.brief_title: Single Embryo Transfer Euploid Embryo Versus Double Embryo Transfer
DOC.detailed_description: This study recruit patient NJ/NY/CT/eastern PA area . Twin higher-order multiple pregnancy common significant complication pregnancy conceive assisted reproductive technology ( ART ) . Twin rate vitro fertilization ( IVF ) cycle approximately 30 % . These pregnancy increase complication mother baby . A singleton , one baby , safe outcome IVF cycle . The sure way reduce risk multiple birth IVF cycle transfer few embryo . Prior study single embryo transfer ( SET ) show decreased pregnancy rate difficulty select embryo transfer . Being chromosomally normal necessary delivery healthy baby . The investigator able screen 24 chromosome embryo great 97 % accuracy within four hour , allow fresh embryo transfer test embryo , use Comprehensive Chromosome Screening ( CCS ) . This study seek show transfer single CCS-normal embryo result delivery rate equal result two embryo transfer , current standard care IVF . Patients undergo IVF accord protocol recommend primary doctor . On day egg retrieval , mature egg fertilize intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) per routine laboratory protocol . Embryos culture day 5 per routine laboratory procedure . The embryo assess embryologist day 5 determine patient candidate fresh transfer . Patients candidate fresh transfer randomize either single embryo transfer chromosomally normal embryo group double , untested embryo group . Patients 50:50 chance single double embryo transfer group . Embryos single embryo group undergo biopsy CCS patient undergo transfer morphologically best , chromosomally normal embryo . Additional embryo cryopreserved . Patients double embryo transfer group undergo two embryo transfer . Additional embryo cryopreserved . If patient candidate fresh transfer ( potentially endometrial lining development , risk ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome , embryo suitable biopsy day 5 ) , still randomize either single double embryo transfer group . Patients single embryo transfer group embryos biopsied CCS prior frozen . Patients immediately undergo synthetic frozen embryo transfer cycle accordance randomization . Patients double embryo transfer group embryos frozen immediately prepare synthetic frozen embryo transfer cycle accordance randomization . Any patient become pregnant fresh transfer cycle immediately undergo synthetic frozen embryo transfer cycle accordance original randomization . All clinical follow per routine regard pregnancy testing , early pregnancy monitoring subsequent transfer care patient 's obstetrician . If clinical miscarriage occur , cell product conception collect , possible , submit genetic analysis . If pregnancy progress delivery , buccal swab ( small swab touch inside baby 's cheek ) collect submit genetic analysis .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Maximum one ( 1 ) prior fail IVF cycle ( failed cycle cycle deliver . Pregnancy loss fail cycle . Ok participate recipient egg donor cycle . ) 2 . Female partner le 43 year old time onset IVF cycle 3 . Maximum prior day 3 follicle stimulation hormone ( FSH ) level 12 ( RMA NJ laboratory ) 4 . Minimum antimullerian hormone ( AMH ) 1.2 within 1 year 5 . Normal uterine cavity demonstrate saline sonogram , hysterosalpingogram hysteroscopy within 1 year . 6 . Male partner great 100,000 total motile spermatozoon . Donor sperm ok. 7 . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) less equal 30 kg/m2 . 1 . Diagnosis chronic anovulation ( cycle typically longer 90 day ) 2 . Diagnosis endometrial insufficiency prior cycle endometrial thickness le 6mm , abnormal endometrial echotexture , persistent endometrial fluid . 3 . Clinical indication aneuploidy screening ( i.e . history loss chromosomally abnormal pregnancy ) 4 . Clinical indication PGD singlegene disorder ( i.e . PGD need select transfer embryo affect specific condition ) 5 . Use testicular aspiration biopsy procedure obtain sperm 6 . Unevaluated ovarian mass surgically confirm stage IV endometriosis 7 . Presence hydrosalpinges communicate endometrial cavity 8 . Any contraindication undergo vitro fertilization
